name: A Deadly Internship
description:
The Place? Victorian England.

The Crime? Murder.

The Culprit? Unknown.

In this point and click whodunit mystery game, you play as Death’s assistant/unpaid intern, who has been given the opportunity of an (un)lifetime to prove himself to the Reaper: Take on an unsolved murder and determine who needs to be punished. Examine the scene of the crime, talk with the souls of the damned, and find the murderer for the sake of justice! (and your job)

CREDITS (Inelegant Games, an INT D 450 production):

Sam Mackenzie - Writer, Creative Lead

Xiding Luo - Visual, Audio, Additional Programming

Zepeng Xiao - Main Programmer

Zhouheng He - Management, Level Design

Please leave a rating!
